title: Senior Guest Experience Manager, France (Contract)
content:
Airbnb was born in 2007 when two Hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 4 million Hosts who have welcomed more than 1 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, Hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.The Difference You will Make:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Guest Experience Manager  to cater to the unique travel needs and preferences of high-profile clientele, including celebrities, influencers and other notable figures. The ideal candidate is an ambitious, organized, customer focused individual with a passion for ultra-luxury travel, interested in developing their sales career. You have sales and travel destination knowledge, excellent communication skills, and are motivated by qualifying guest needs into impeccable recommendations that will provide them with a perfect stay experience.
Please note that this role is a 12-month contract position.  We request that you submit your resume/CV application in English.
A Typical Day: 

Provide sound knowledge of Airbnb Luxe homes and destinations to guests. Qualify guest needs and provide creative (even off-platform) solutions.
Provide personalized and discreet services while ensuring a high level of guest satisfaction and maintaining confidentiality at all times.
Interface with multiple stakeholders, including the guest, travel coordinators, luxury home owners, realtors and other travel suppliers, from the guestâ€™s initial contact to the time of booking. This includes finding appropriate accommodations (either on or off platform), responding timely to inquiries and follow up questions, securing the reservation, collecting payment, elevating the stay experience, and following up with the client pre-trip, on-trip and post-trip.
Ensure all trip arrangements are executed flawlessly, taking into account potential last-minute changes and unforeseen circumstances.
Meet and/or exceed key sales and service performance indicators.
Act as a point of contact and support for guests during travel, addressing any issues or emergencies that may arise.
Establish and maintain relationships with luxury home owners, real estate, villa and other travel-related vendors to ensure high-quality service and preferential treatment for notable guests.
Provide accurate cost estimates for travel arrangements and manage budgets according to guest expectations.
Negotiate favorable rates, services and amenities with vendors while adhering to the guest's financial preferences.

Your Expertise:

8+ years of relevant work experience
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Hospitality, Tourism, or a related field (preferred)
Passionate, well versed and proven experience in luxury travel, hospitality, real estate or villa specialists. Global travel destination knowledge is preferred.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English; French language skills a plus
Proven solution selling skills, with the natural ability to overcome objections. An overriding sense of urgency and a competitive spirit towards achievement of targets.
Professional demeanor, maturity, and natural business acumen with exceptionally high level of customer service.
In-depth knowledge of the entertainment industry, including travel requirements, preferences, and schedules.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with an ability to build rapport and trust with high-profile clients.
Experience using CRM systems, i.e. Salesforce
Proven organizational skills which are reflected in effective prioritizing, multitasking, follow-up, and ultimate delivery upon commitments.
Ability to work under pressure and adapt to changing situations.
Discretion and respect for client privacy and confidentiality.

 
Our Commitment To Inclusion & Belonging:
Airbnb is committed to working with the broadest talent pool possible. We believe diverse ideas foster innovation and engagement, and allow us to attract creatively-led people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. All qualified individuals are encouraged to apply.

questions.label: Why have you chosen to apply to Airbnb?
Which city are you based?  Are you able to relocate out of your own accord to the preferred location for this role (Paris, France)?
Would you require visa sponsorship to work in the country in which this position is based?

questions.description:
Airbnb is committed to creating a diverse workplace. In order to measure our efforts in this regard, we invite applicants to self-identify as to their gender. Answering to this question is entirely voluntary and declining to provide this information will not subject you to adverse treatment or retaliation. The response that you do provide will be maintained confidential and will not be shared with hiring managers. In turn, Airbnb will anonymize the information related to your gender, so that once it is collected it will not be possible to relate it, directly or indirectly, to you.

All individuals seeking employment at Airbnb are considered without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other legally protected characteristic. You are being given the opportunity to provide such information in order to help us measure our own diversity and inclusion efforts and to comply with our internal equal employment opportunity standards.

All of your personal information, including your gender should you choose to provide it, will be collected, stored and processed in accordance with the Airbnb Privacy Notice.
